page.title: 08CLUBS
page.content: Our survey showed that for children Cubs, Brownies, Guides and Scouts are the popular clubs. For adults sports clubs have increased in popularity recently, especially those dealing with gynastics, dance or aerobics. Clubs dealing with eighteen different sporting activities were mentioned by people questioned. Of the different social club mentioned the Royal British Legion was the most popular. {At the club} My dad is in the Longbridge Social Club. To prove you are a member you have to show your card. Yau can see films there; it doesn't cost very much. Clubs that are affiliated have parties at Christmas and member can take their family. When we got there we have a disco then a party after and we have streamers and balloons and eat cake.
